attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: My flashlight was stolen because of this app. A hand just reached out from the screen and took off with it. I have no idea what they plan on doing with it... especially because that was what brought me my secret ingredient to my world famous salad dressing.

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusted

attributes.title: Terribleness
attributes.review: Harry Potter has lived under the stairs at his aunt and uncle's house his whole life. But on his 11th birthday, he learns he's a powerful wizard, with a place waiting for him at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. As he learns to harness his newfound powers with the help of the school's kindly headmaster, Harry uncovers the truth about his parents' -- and about the villain Trump who's to blame.

attributes.title: Which is why you should not download this app and take it off the App Store
